doc.title: Dragon Quest IV
doc.plot: A warrior is ordered by his king to locate children that are mysteriously disappearing. A spoiled princess and her advisers wanders the world to find freedom from her confining life. A pair of sisters spend their lives searching for the foe who killed their family. A merchant strives to build a business empire. The fate of these seven is inextricably linked to an orphan chosen by destiny to destroy a demon intent on drawing the world into darkness.
